Microsoft's annual cloud revenue hits $75 billion, profit beats expectations
Posted
Wednesday,
July 30, 2025
5:58 pm
Via ABC - Business wire stories
Microsoft reveals that its Azure cloud computing platform has generated over $75 billion in annual revenue, marking a 34% increase from the previous year
Continue reading at ABC - Business wire stories »
